roleset.name: to foam, become bubbly
roleset.note: FROTH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'froth' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from froth.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: At 4 1\/2 pounds , it may be too ambitiously named [*-1] , but it nevertheless opens up the kind of marketing possibilities that [*T*-2]make analysts froth .
